pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of a salvage therapy using transrectal high-intensity focused ultrasonography (HIFU) for locally recurrent prostate cancer after external beam radiotherapy.

metaData.source:
Quantitative study of focused ultrasound enhanced doxorubicin delivery to prostate tumor in vivo with MRI guidance
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22559650/
